content: Beam Clamps Beam clamps for attaching threaded rods to structural beams ### Categories: Home > Products > Modular support systems > System connectors and interfaces- - - ### FEATURES:Features No drilling or welding neccessary Each set for an installation is completely pre-assembled and suits all usual sizes of T-beams Flexibility and no loss of spare parts Each clamp is completely pre-assembled and suits all usual sizes of I-beams Hardened cup-point set screw and locknut Applications Securing threaded rods to steel beams Securing channel installations to steel beams Structural attachment with infinite adjustment to top or bottom of metal beams, purlins, channel or angle iron to support hanger rod Structural attachment with infinite adjustment to top or bottom of metal beams, purlins, channel or angle iron to support hanger rod ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base material type: Steel Material composition: Ductil iron casting - ASTM A563 Environmental conditions: Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) Technical Data | Base material type | Steel | Material composition | Ductil iron casting - ASTM A563 | Surface finish | Indoor Coated - Electro galvanized | Environmental conditions | Dry indoor conditions (C1) Indoor with temporary condensation (C2) | Load range | Medium duty ### ITEMS- 257367 - Beam clamp BC 1/2 - Package Size 50 pc - 306601 - Beam clamp BC-EG 1/2 - Package Size 50 pc - 258002 - Beam clamp BC-EG 1/4 - Package Size 100 pc - 257366 - Beam clamp BC 3/8 - Package Size 100 pc - 306600 - Beam clamp BC-EG 3/8 - Package Size 100 pc - 257368 - Beam clamp BC 5/8 - Package Size 50 pc
